title: A free and offenceles iustification of a lately publisht and most maliciously misinterpreted poeme: entituled Andromeda liberata.
author: Chapman, George, 1559?-1634.
publisher: Printed [by Eliot's Court Press] for Laurence L'Isle and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls church-yard at the signe of the Tigers-head,
notes: Running title reads: The iustification of Perseus and Andromeda.
Some print show-through; some leaves cropped.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
